title: Album Page, "Gondolas and Riverboats, Venice", October 29, 1887
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on thick cream wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
markings: Verso, stamped in black ink (badly smudged): (inscribed in wreath): Museum / for the / Arts of / Decoration.
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, top right corner: (inscribed in circle) 77; in center at right: Oct 29th 1887; at right: coal boat.
description: Vertical sheet with six sketches of a variety of sail boats, river boats, and gondolas.  The bottom half of the sheet has what the artist notes as a "coal boat" with two large sails in shades of pink and gray, and a small figure standing near the bow.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Gondolas and Riverboats, Venice", October 29, 1887.Brush and watercolor, graphite on thick cream wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-21.
